title: E-commerce Website
skills: React.js, Tailwind CSS, Azure, API, JSON, AI chatbot
description: Built a comprehensive e-commerce platform using React.js, and Tailwind CSS with dynamic product listings. Integrated an AI chatbot for user interaction and optimized API fetching for performance. Automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions for seamless Azure deployment.

title: Hospital Management System
skills: Core Java, JSF, MySQL, MVC Architecture, J2EE.
description: Developed a role-based hospital management system with Java, JSF, and MySQL, optimizing appointment scheduling and patient management. Implemented a multi-layer MVC architecture and created interactive dashboards for improved usability.

title: Restaurant Discovery Platform
description: Developed a Restaurant Discovery Platform with role-based access (Admin, Manager, User) for streamlined restaurant management and browsing. Integrated OOP, Inheritance, Collections, and JDBC for efficient data handling and smooth user experience.
